name: System Prompt Variants
description: Test how different system prompts affect response quality

test_cases.name: No System Prompt
test_cases.prompt: Explain what Docker is in 2 sentences.

test_cases.name: Expert Persona
test_cases.system_prompt: You are a senior DevOps engineer with 15 years of experience. Be concise and practical.
test_cases.prompt: Explain what Docker is in 2 sentences.

test_cases.name: Beginner-Friendly
test_cases.system_prompt: You are a patient teacher explaining to someone new to programming. Use simple analogies, avoid jargon.
test_cases.prompt: Explain what Docker is in 2 sentences.

test_cases.name: Structured Output
test_cases.system_prompt:
Always respond in this format:
SUMMARY: (one line)
DETAILS: (2-3 bullet points)
